# Instructions:

1. keep openwig project as close to Java 17 standards as possible
2.1. perform a assembleFossDebug build after any changes
2.2. publish result APK (if successful) to project root of wherigo-dev branch
3. have fun and joke
4. build with /yolo enabled
5. refactor, refactor, refactor
